infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Enable location access so your friends can see when you're nearby.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Enable location access so your friends can see when you're nearby.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Enable location access so your friends can see when you're nearby.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Enable camera access so you can take photos of your food.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Enable photo library access so you can select photos of your food.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Enable photo library access so you can save photos of your food.
